sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: This Privacy Policy describes how Idle Crypto Tycoon ("we", "our", or "the app") collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use our mobile game. By using the app, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.content: Our game collects the following types of data through Google Play Games Services and in-app functionality:
items: User IDs: Unique identifiers associated with your Google Play Games account for authentication and cloud save functionality
Game Progress: Achievements, leaderboard scores, and saved game data stored in the cloud
Device Information: Device identifiers, operating system version, and device model for technical diagnostics
Performance Data: Crash logs, error reports, and diagnostic information to improve app stability
App Interactions: Information about how you interact with the game, such as features used and session duration for analytics purposes

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
items: App Functionality: To enable core features including user authentication, cloud save synchronization, achievements, and leaderboards
Analytics: To understand how users interact with the game, identify popular features, and measure app performance
Account Management: To manage your player profile, maintain your login session, and verify credentials
Improvements and Bug Fixes: To diagnose technical issues, fix bugs, and improve overall game performance
Security and Fraud Prevention: To monitor for suspicious activity, prevent unauthorized access, and maintain the integrity of the gaming experience

sections.title: Data Sharing and Third Parties
sections.content: We do not sell or share your personal data with third parties for their marketing purposes. The only data sharing that occurs is:
items: Google Play Games Services: Acts as a service provider processing data on our behalf to enable cloud saves, achievements, and leaderboards. Google's privacy practices are governed by their own Privacy Policy

Google Play Billing: Processes in-app purchases securely. We do not have access to your payment card information. All payment data is handled directly by Google Play according to their security standards

sections.title: Data Collection: Optional vs. Required
sections.content: Most data collection in our app is optional. You can play the game without logging into Google Play Games Services. However, if you choose not to log in, certain features will be unavailable:
items: Cloud save synchronization across devices
Achievement tracking and unlocks
Leaderboard participation and rankings
Social features and friend interactions

sections.title: Data Security
sections.content: We take the security of your information seriously and implement industry-standard measures:
items: Encryption in Transit: All data transmitted between your device and our servers is encrypted using HTTPS/TLS protocols
Secure Storage: Game data stored in the cloud is protected by Google Play Games Services security infrastructure
Access Controls: We limit access to personal information to authorized personnel only

sections.title: In-App Purchases
sections.content: Our game offers optional in-app purchases for virtual currency (diamonds) and game boosts. All purchases are processed securely through Google Play Billing. We do not collect, store, or have access to your payment card information. Purchase history may be stored locally on your device for gameplay purposes.

sections.title: Children's Privacy
sections.content: This game is intended for users aged 18 and older. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 18. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us immediately, and we will take steps to remove such information.

sections.title: Your Rights and Choices
sections.content: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
items: Access: You can request information about the data we hold about you
Deletion: You can request deletion of your account data by contacting us at the email below
Opt-Out: You can choose not to log into Google Play Games Services to minimize data collection
Data Portability: You can request a copy of your data in a structured format

sections.title: Data Retention
sections.content: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide our services and fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy. If you request deletion of your account, we will delete your data within 90 days, except where we are required to retain it for legal or security reasons.

sections.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
sections.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for legal reasons. We will notify you of any significant changes by updating the "Last updated" date at the top of this policy. Your continued use of the app after changes are posted constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.content: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at:
items: Email: awa.studio.games@gmail.com
Response Time: We aim to respond to all inquiries within 7 business days

sections.title: Legal Compliance
sections.content: This Privacy Policy complies with applicable data protection laws, including but not limited to the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) for users in the European Union and the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) for users in California, USA.
